==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|相|心|t2=heart, mind|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s}} – to think, to consider.

===Etymology===
From {{och-l|相|to observe; appearance}} (“appearance > to visualise > to think”).

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=xiǎng
|c=soeng2
|h=pfs=sióng
|md=suōng

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[think]] {{gloss|to conceive of something or someone}}
#* {{zh-x|我 想 她 是 衰老 了。|I think she's going senile.}}
# to [[think]] about; to [[plan]]; to be [[considering]]
#* {{zh-x|我 想 在 暑假 打工。|I'm '''planning''' to get a job for the summer.}}
# to [[think]]; to [[suppose]]; to [[guess]]; to [[reckon]]
#* {{zh-x|我 想 我 能 給 你 找到 合適 的 尺碼。|I think I can find the right size for you.}}
# to [[want]]; to [[wish]] for; to [[desire]]
#* {{zh-x|還 想 喝 一 杯 嗎？|Would you '''like''' another drink?}}
#* {{zh-x|她 想 當 芭蕾舞 演員。|She '''wants''' to be a ballet dancer.}}
# to [[miss]] {{gloss|to feel the absence of someone or something}}
#* {{zh-x|你 走 了 我 會 想 你 的。|I'll '''miss''' you when you're gone.}}
